m3b-bms.title: Brewery Management System
m3b-bms.description:
This is a portfolio application designed to help craft beverage or breweries run their business - from recipe creation, to inventory and client base management including a delivery feature. 
 This app is intended to be a personal project showcasing web development skills as part of a portfolio. It's a CRUD app built using NextJS, a meta framework based on ReactJS, and coded in TypeScript. The app is connected to a MongoDB database and has the potential to be a dedicated end-to-end solution for the brewery industry.
features: Authentication and Authorization with Users management
Create and manage products and inventory (beers only for now) - create, edit, read, and delete
Step form for creating products and recipes
Manage Domain's client base and deliveries
Styled with Ant Design and Bootstrap
Google Places, Maps, and Autofill API integration

ems.title: Employee Leave Manager
ems.description: An ASP.NET Core and Entity Framework based web application for managing employee leaves. This is another portfolio app to learn, use and leverage the Microsoft .NET environement.
features: Authentication integrated with ASP.NET Core Identity
Admin have a dashboard view. They can manage Employees, Leave Types, and Allocate leaves to Employees.
Employees can request Leaves to Admins
External Services: Integration with email services for seamless communication and notifications
Deployment: The application has been deployed to Microsoft Azure cloud platform, through a CI/CD pipeline using GitHub
IIS (Internet Information Services): The application has been published and hosted on a local IIS server for testing purposes
SQL Server: The application is integrated with a SQL Server database to store and manage data related to employees, leave types, and leave requests
